solid the shipping took a while but the quality and battery life of the ring is really good the only thing is that i wish it tracked more workouts the app is easy to use
does what it says it ll do works as described even while wearing it on my thumb well priced although i d prefer if it were not made in china enters sleep mode automatically and readings are accurate

support extremely supportive the support people are extremely helpful i had a problem with the battery in my ring gen they did some troubleshooting with me but when that didn t work they sent me a replacement ring before i returned my old ring
super happy with it super happy with the rings performance only con is that it could use more exercise options
overall not bad overall not bad step count could be more accurate
great product great product works well feels comfortable and isn t heavy nice sizing and overall process

excellent support excellent support ordered the wrong ring size and ringconn took care of me very quickly my experience the ring size kit is true to fit i am very happy with the performance of my new ring and would highly recommend this product to anyone
the ring is providing just what i was the ring is providing just what i was looking for with the benefit of not having to pay for a subscription with no benefit

best smart ring i have tried the company is responsive when i email them or submit feedback via the app usually responding within business days there are frequent updates as they roll out new features and or fix bugs the ring battery lasts me about days with daily exercise mode and i wear it constantly i also walk about an hour a day and the battery holds up well in exercise mode i did an interview when they were rolling out the women s health and they sent me a thank you gift that was beautiful and well packaged i like the data and how it is presented in graphs
great ring great ring does a great job tracking sleep very comfortable so much better to sleep in than a watch

the ringconn has helped me better the ringconn has helped me better assess my sleep more than any other device has i highly suggest this ring since there s no monthly fee the app shows some fun stuff coming on the horizon for the already existing ring
good stats tracker this is a much better vital stats tracker then fitbit

good product company was quick to respond to my questions it took a little bit to get my ring however was well worth the wait fantastic battery life and great information my husband wants to switch from his oura and get one of these ring fits true to size using their ring guide

still relatively adjusting but so far still relatively adjusting but so far everything has been as great as i expected the only thing is that the app doesn t take temp on demand only when sleeping other than that i love the purchase
the best fitness tracker i ve used date of experience may

ring is nice app syncing with others could be better product seems to be well thought out slim and comfortable to wear wear it working out and to sleep and does not distract me at all would have given it a solid stars if the data could be synced with other apps easier data is more useful when combined with other sources
good experience good product shipping took a while but happy with the ring

deceptive and sketchy company the gold ring featured on the website was not the color i received it was a completely different ring the women i spoke to on the phone even confirmed there was a difference in color and said it is a common complaint that is deceptive marketing and extremely sketchy i also have yet to receive my refund for the ring followed all the difficult return instructions and still no refund
the ring is doing everything i wanted the ring is doing everything i wanted it to do and more

great tracker many things to like about this ring comfortable excellent battery life free app with great info overall performs it consistently well i like the workout tracking for walking running and how it shows distance and path would like to see more workout options e g yoga strength training just to keep record of those workouts as well
easy and comfortable to wear battery easy and comfortable to wear battery life is great
easy to use and understand easy to use and understand love this product

love the ring for the most part love the ring for the most part the exercise category could use some improvement there s not many exercises to choose from run walk cycle and it does not transfer data from apple health it looks as if i haven t exercised when i weight lift because i don t wear the ring but i would have that data if it successfully gathered information from apple health
love their products love their products customer service was great

outstanding product outstanding product yes would buy again

inaccurate after using the ringconn gen for one week i find it to be inaccurate in many aspects particularly step count as compared to both my apple watch and iphone i also found that the o saturation levels were inaccurate as compared to my pulse oximeter it did not detect nap times either although it is an attractive ring i m questioning its accuracy in other areas as well
excellent date of experience april
love it having used smart rings for many years this is so far my favourite ring looks nice app has clear ui no bs monthly fee or subscription required to access ur data

it s early but overall very satisfied over all i am very satisfied with the ring it doesn t have more bells whistles than necessary i wish the app was a bit more customizable i talked to customer service a couple of times for clarification first time the representative made me feel very confident that the answers they gave were correct second time a little different experience but not enough to keep me from ordering my questions were if the actual ring was the same size as the sizing kit or slightly smaller or bigger told slightly smaller when i got the ring it was actually slightly bigger very slightly i went with the size that the sizer was slightly difficult to get over my knuckle would have preferred a size but informed not available doesn t hurt to ask actual ring slides a bit too easy a size smaller would have been perfect look forward using this for a lot longer than i used my fitbit charge

great ring overall just needs some improvements in monitoring workouts this has been a great smart ring the price is right and i love that the app and plethora of data are both free the first ring i received was not tracking vitals properly but ringconn was responsive and sent a replacement ring it did take a couple of weeks this ring has been consistently tracking data and i love how many graphs are provided for interpretation it seems to do a good job with step tracking at least for trends but it struggles to accurately monitor my heart rate during rowing workouts i have automatic workout mode detection on and even set it to an indoor cycling workout but my heart rate is rarely registers above bpm it does much better during running workouts women s health cycle tracking was one of my main reasons for purchasing it s very simple but temperature shifts was all i needed so this does the job just fine overall i would definitely recommend the ring
my new ring works great my new ring works great its just like it was advertised to be i m very happy

love the ring love the ring this is my nd one and would buy it again only thing that i would change is i wish i could disable the period tracker but that s it all the other information is great and i use it to stay on top of my health as much as possible

room for accuracy improvement i think the sleep tracking is accurate along with stress the heart rate is terrible i did an intense hiit cycle workout for minutes where i know it is burning at least calories and my ring said it burned and the my bpm is like so that s frustrating that the calorie burn is not accurate and i can t return it even if i wanted to

ring does not count properly steps ring does not count properly steps it has huge difference to benchmark devices like watch etc by approximately more steps i compared for already weeks and nothing improves

love it i love my ring easy to wear and comfortable the data is quite accurate beside the period tracker hence why a four star the period tracker is a bit off for me and there s no way to see all the symptoms you ve put and go back quickly to see them maybe it is different for others otherwise i absolutely love it i would loooveeee to have new things on it like caffeine window hopefully soon
very responsive and super helpful very responsive and super helpful having to monitor for several weeks before any action could be completed though was a little difficult

blows the competition out of the water blows the competition out of the water the battery life is amazing only have to charge one every days and it takes about an hour the fit is great it s not too thick of a ring and feels and looks great on your finger my one and only flaw is that it scratches very easily but i wear this sucker to do everything so that may be on me
the ring itself is wonderful the ring itself is wonderful good metrics good quality weight and size the app is fine too but i think the ai partner could be more helpful and personal

quick support ordered the gen air first but while waiting for the sizing kit to arrive i decided to go with the gen contacted support was able to quickly get a response got the air cancelled and the gen ordered

the ringconn rings are working the ringconn rings are working wonderfully long battery life and pretty accurate readings compared to our pixel watches we both have sleep apnea and the incite into our sleep history is very helpful now only if the rings could link to our adjustable beds to raise or lower would be even more helpful in getting a good night s rest

looooooove my ring looooooove my ring i switched from an apple watch and it was the best decision ever my watch was dying all the time and i truly was over getting notifications on my wrist all day but enjoyed the health tracking aspects so kept wearing it but the ring is sooooo much better i love tracking my sleep and my cycle i get excited to wake up and check my sleep score every day the battery life is amazing i ve had the ring about months now and i ve charged it times for about minutes each and that is all i also get compliments all the time on how thin the ring is and how my friends with the other big brand wish they had done more research and got this one recommend
i love the diagnostic aspect of the i love the diagnostic aspect of the ring and everything it tells me about my health

i got a ringconn for my birthday last i got a ringconn for my birthday last august the reason i chose it is because this ring is one of the few that doesn t charge you a monthly subscription charge i think the app is robust and it tracks a bunch of good information and feedback my wife liked it so much she asked for one for her birthday so that is what i got her we now compare stats at breakfast
i received the ring i received the ring it will not pair with phone app there is no way to get in touch with a technician my ring just sits in the box i can t even find out how to mail it back
long lasting and useful analysis date of experience april

urgently needed improvements good points useful data long battery life easy to handle ring what s missing berblick der f nf vitalzeichen german i don t see a possibility to visualize historic data diagrams for day week month year of the five vital values vitalzeichen what s to much the textual explanations are boring permanently repeating the same text modules i do not need them but i can t disable them please change it i can t disable messages from rincon that i m too long in bed and not moving but i m just reading and working accuracy the heart rate measurement bpm it s not reacting fast enough while in training mode it should permanently measure my heart so that i can know when i should slow down my apple watch reacts much faster when my heart rate increases or decreases again due to greater exertion during training i wouldn t bother if the battery life would be much shorter through training sessions
sleep monitoring i bought the ring mainly for sleep monitoring it does not appear to be very accurate rem and deep sleep are probably close but awake is classified as light sleep often
i like the ring but it could use more i like the ring but it could use more exercise options

the ring itself is excellent the ring itself is excellent light weight long battery life and more importantly provides key health metrics although the android app is very good the exercise types it s able to track should be improved and should include integration with health connect

love the weight love the weight design and the length of the charge but very disappointed that the only activity choices are walking indoor outdoor running and indoor outdoor biking also disappointed you can t add them after the fact so you have to have your phone to start and stop activity
i ordered the wrong size ring guards i ordered the wrong size ring guards not knowing your sizing ran small you want me to pay a fee to exchange them

battery life is the best part by far date of experience april

the ring dosent track sleep as the ring dosent track sleep as accurately as i would like due to it being the main reason for the purchase th colour was disappointing as it was browner in person compared to described and this week after having the ring for less then a week the charger broke

im actually really positively surprised im actually really surprised only positive feedback shipping was extremely fast for sizing kit and ring likewise the new app is well designed and has good overview and indepth data as well has spotted a few stressful days and also a light cold i caught all in all i love it

great product easy to order sent sizers quickly once determined the size just select size ring it was shipped quickly easy set up and have enjoyed wearing ring and looking at the data product does what it says it will do

ring size corrected upon notification worked with ring to resolve an issue i had with sizing and they were quick to handle and secure the right size i just wish the ring sizer kit had been precise i purchased it to make sure abba doing that the plastic ring size kit would wasn t reliable for me it could be that my fingers were swollen the day i tried though nonetheless ring made it right and i am grateful for that

exceptional product and customer service a truly outstanding experience i ve been a dedicated supporter of ringconn since december initially backing them through their indiegogo campaign from the very beginning their communication has been nothing short of excellent clear consistent and timely over time i ve watched the ringconn android app evolve through multiple updates each bringing meaningful improvements the biometric insights provided by the ring have been both valuable and informative helping me better understand and monitor my health when ringconn released version of their smart ring in september i didn t hesitate to place an order the purchasing experience was seamless and once again their communication throughout the process was top tier in april i reached out to their customer support team with a question i was blown away not only does ringconn offer what i believe to be the best smart ring on the market especially considering its competitive price lack of a subscription fee and robust health tracking features but their customer support is truly outstanding their responses were prompt clear and reliable most impressively when they say they ll follow up they actually do my experience with both the product and the support team has far exceeded my expectations i wholeheartedly recommend ringconn to anyone looking for a high quality smart ring backed by exceptional service
have had version of another common have had version of another common ring this one is so much better more features and app is much more useful
ring did not work you can only ring did not work you can only communicate with them via email to china they didn t credit my cc after the item was returned overall a bad experience do not buy

the dune gold is a much more coppery the dune gold is a much more coppery gold than i had anticipated which isn t a huge deal i love the app integration and the overall ui which makes it easy to navigate and see the views most important to me it s been a good month or so wearing so far and haven t had any issues with wearing it

i like this ring a lot i like this ring a lot especially that no subscription is required it s much more accurate than my samsung smart watch with regard to blood o and more comfortable to wear at night i see areas for improvement it would be nice if it talked to the watch watch software also it needs to come in sizes i ve had to add a small piece of mounting tape to the underside of the top to keep it from constantly rolling around my finger however the next size smaller was nearly impossible to get off my finger if my hand was warm so i sized up
great device and it tracks what i need great device and it tracks what i need

best experience with the company and best experience with the company and the product fast and free delivery to eu and free sizing kit only one disadvantage that you can not track workouts like pilates joga etc only running cycling or walking

awful awful if i could give a no star i would i returned my rings and never receive a refund they have been siting at the address i sent to for a month and of course after i sent them back no response to any of of emails
love my ringconn the whole process was easy my sizing kit arrived after days and my ring arrived after only days i love tracking my sleep
the customer service was great my only the customer service was great my only issue was the ring sizes are too small and there is no larger options available

the product design and assembly are the product design and assembly are beautiful and pleasing but the walking tracking function seems to be more than it actually is

a sleek ring with great features i ve been using the ringconn gen smart ring for several weeks now and i am very happy with it i never expected the ring to be perfect and there is nothing like a visit to your healthcare provider however with my experience using the ringconn i am very satisfied with the close to accurate information i get the information it provides me keeps me on track with my wellness goals i especially like the sleep feature which allows me to see my sleeping patterns and how to improve them the ring provides various features and although i might not utilize them all i am glad they are available i did research on the different health rings available in the market and felt that this particular model of ring would best suit my needs the ringconn gen smart ring is a compelling choice for those seeking a high quality health monitoring device without the burden of subscription fees its exceptional battery life comfortable design and health tracking features make it a worthwhile purchase while i have experienced some limitations in fitness tracking the overall value it offers has far exceeded my expectations
nice to have a monitor for sleeping nice to have a monitor for sleeping counts the hrs even though i get up often checks oxy level every min too
my ring is too small and you dont make my ring is too small and you dont make a bigger ring for me let me know when i can send this one in and you send me a bigger one when you make one
this ring is awesome this ring does everything i wanted it to and more the amount of information is amazing
love this ring love this ring keeps track of so much my only complaint is the charger it does not fit in a usb port need to do better
so far has being a good product so far has being a good product good quality and measurement of data

i enjoyed the activity and sleep i enjoyed the activity and sleep readings the sorry information was very interesting i also liked the look of the ring my time was cut short with the ring though i lost it after owning it for days it didn t slip off it was my fault even though i didn t have it long i miss checking the app for the different readings

overall pretty accurate the ring seems to be pretty accurate and a lot of data is collected and shared through the app it would be more convenient if it picked up automatically on the start of exercising but starting it manually through the app isn t so bad as long as you remember to i wish it would upload my info directly to myfitnesspal overall i think it tracks sleep pretty accurately and i did get a health alert when a migraine woke me up at night so it knew something wasn t normal overall a good ring to buy
no complaints i ve had nothing but good experiences with ringconn their customer service has been excellent when i needed it and the ring seems to work well i have zero complaints
best value for a great ring great design lightweight and comfortable keeps track of everything very well more vitals than my previous ring and the price is way better than the oura

very inaccurate data compared to watch very inaccurate data compared to my garmin monitor watch you smooth data for heart rate and spo which is particularly useless sleep data is also mostly wrong and hard to understand ring looks good and holds charge otherwise pretty much a bad purchase

decent amount of provided data but uncomfortable the ring is helpful with the information it provides but it s very uncomfortable to wear especially if i happen to be bloated that day or after a long day of typing and my fingers swell i picked a size sizes bigger than my wedding ring and it still leaves little indentions in my skin i would not purchase again

it s okay i feel the ring isn t accurate with the reading it gives i wish i had read everything before buying it i would have returned it but the return policy is very limited otherwise the looks nice and charges quickly

worth the very long wait from ordering to receiving took over six weeks initially the ring sizer kit arrives then when size is confirmed your actual ring arrives ring is great charges very quickly light and attractive design and the data it collects is accurate and really useful to improve health the sleep monitoring is fascinating and explains why i feel like i do when i wake up thoroughly recommended

love this ring love this ring process was super easy to get the right size you place your order they send you a ring sizing kit if you need one you wear the sizer ring for at least a day to make sure it s comfortable then go back to your orders and mark which size you d like and they ship it to you the first days i did their sleep apnea tracking and it worked wonderfully very cool to see all of the insights as someone with sleep apnea i wear it daily to track my heart rate as i have a condition called pots this seems to be the only ring that constantly tracks your heart rate even when not exercising battery life is amazing all in all it s a great product

my battery on my ringconn is awful my battery on my ringconn is awful in the last month it has been a slow deterioration of battery life longevity i charge it and by the next morning more then of my battery is gone it is not lasting days

after a lot of review and research i after a lot of review and research i decided to go with ringconn over its competitors and i m glad i did i bought it mainly for sleep tracking and management and it has helped me to have a better and more consistent night s sleep which has led to more energy and productivity in my days i have since recommended to several people ringconn and they are happy with their purchase as well
i love the ring i love the ring it fits well i hardly know i am wearing it the app is fantastic it provides me with all the data i need to understand my sleep and health would highly recommend

lack of information i was offered the chance to buy an older version with a discounted price but they forgot to mention that they are not making that version anymore so the size i needed was never going to be in stock again i waited for around a month for it to be in stock when i had to reach out to them and they offered a refund
more exercise options would be more exercise options would be beneficial my ring doesn t detect my workouts strength training and indoor walking at the very least

not accurate i went with this primarily for step tracking and sleep information i ve found when i wake up it already has steps i don t sleepwalk or get up to go to the bathroom and i question whether the step count is accurate during the day as well it always seems very high and the sleep must be based on being horizontal i was recently traveling and got some great long sleep on some plane rides but the ring totally missed it and then it counted a massage as my being completely asleep i may have dozed off for a minute or two lol but definitely did not sleep through the whole thing i took it off after that and haven t been inclined to wear it again a bummer though it s expensive and i am interested in tracking this information
it reeks with tech it reeks with tech just the way i like it

good but hopeful for an update i like my ringconn it is super insightful and helps me understand my body more i do wish that it could connect to other apps such as my workout apps the ringconn only has a few options to log workouts all of which are cardio based which is unfortunate for weight training curiosity

i never received the ring so this is more a review of ordering and support i ordered a stainless steel colored ring for my wife s birthday when the sizing kit arrived it included not only ring sizers but also color samples after reviewing them my wife decided she preferred the rose gold option i reached out to customer support to change the selection but they advised me to cancel the original order and place a new one for the rose gold version i followed their instructions and placed a new order however after a lengthy shipping process i received a package containing a sleep mask and an aromatherapy kit no ring i contacted support again and while they did investigate with the shipping provider and issued a refund i was left scrambling to find a replacement birthday gift in the end after more than a month two orders were charged and refunded and i received a package of unrelated items i m genuinely shocked at how disorganized and unreliable their order fulfillment process has been

theres nothing smart about it review for ringconn gen overall really disappointed in this product i honestly want to return it but one it will cost me to ship it back and two i dont have time to deal with that right now its basically a wearable ring health tracker theres nothing smart about it it only writes data it doesnt read meaning that it can only go off its own data i wish i did more research and got something with more integration ai habits and insights the main reason i chose this ring was for the sleep apnea and o tracking which im not even happy with only positive i have is the battery life negatives you can tell from its language that it was manufactured in china iv had issues with the o not reading correctly which is the primary reason i got it i also got it specifically for the sleep apnea tracking but what i didnt find out till i got it is that you have to turn on that setting for it to work its not tracking everyday on its own also it says that it consumes more battery life as well i get warnings for outliers in my heart rate and hrv all the time but its mostly because my schedule varies so much also considers my panic attacks as moderate to high intensity activity exercise mode even when heart rate is unusually high and theres little to no movement i also hate how they have ads on facebook that you can wear it while swimming and in the sauna but when you read about the ring in the app it specifically says you shouldnt wear it in the sauna those are all the issues i can think of off hand but im sure theres more overall my suggestion is do your research theres better options than this

great alternative to smart watch for biometrics ringconn good product the app covers all the biometrics comprehensively information is displayed well and has both i explanations and break out boxes with more detail previous daily data is a matter of swiping right and left to come back judging from the calendar drop down this will probably include daily data for as long as you keep it longer term trends are also available from a different tab the ring is easy to wear remarkably lightweight and looks good the ring s durability has yet to be fully tested but has survived a fair amount of basic tool use and gardening so far i don t avoid getting it wet with the exception that i avoid putting it in hot water dishes showers etc there s always minor issues that may be in development or just personal preferences nothing at all show stopping though audience for the following is more for the developers y axis of graphs varies across days making visual comparisons inconclusive there could be user defined ranges or ranges could be re aligned automatically when required these could be toggled on off x axis includes multiple data points per column a single column contains low medium high vigorous this could be a minute by minute line showing the fluctuations again this could be toggled on off sleep value went down after unusually large amounts of sleep makes sense something is wrong but app says slow down so is only looking at final score not gross value of sleep also records sleep while i m screen reading books the stress indicator appears remarkably inaccurate i don t know enough to make suggestions but it is an area that would likely benefit from some more research data doesn t update without an internet connection surely the base calculations are simple enough to process on device there are times when it quite difficult to obtain internet on a regular basis some of those points would be concessions to battery life and battery life was a primary consideration of purchase

ringconn air i own both ringconn models my wife liked and kept my first purchase which was for my pinky finger so now i have purchased an air for myself i can t see any difference in weight or size between the two models the specs indicate the air has slightly shorter battery life and is made of stainless steel the included charger is smaller but it doesn t include a battery like the standard model i guess that s how they reduced the price personally i like the smaller charger and i don t mind charging it once a week i do wish the gold color choice was available for the air model now to the app it doesn t have all the health metrics that the apple watch has but for what it does measure the ring and watch are in close agreement the ringconn app is easier to read at a glance and also easier to navigate drilling down the detail is sensibly displayed using easy to understand graphs and charts finally there is no monthly fee overall i think this is a great product it does what it does exceptionally well and at a value price

ringconn gen review from ringconn gen review a sleek alternative to the smartwatch i ve been using the ringconn gen for about three weeks now and i have to say i m genuinely impressed customer support that delivers my experience started on a positive note even before the ring arrived i accidentally ordered the wrong size but after contacting customer support they quickly and efficiently arranged for the correct size to be shipped instead the entire process was smooth and i received the perfectly fitting ring without any issues a small device with big capabilities what really surprised me was how advanced this little ring is when it comes to tracking health data it captures a wide range of metrics throughout the day with impressive accuracy as someone who has used smartwatches in the past i d say the ringconn is a compelling alternative especially for those looking for something more discreet and lightweight whether you re monitoring workouts sleep or vital signs the ring delivers solid insights that said during strength training or any activity involving weights i d recommend using finger tape to avoid potential scratches comfort fit i m not someone who normally wears rings but i quickly got used to this one it feels natural on the finger and doesn t shift or feel loose even during runs or fast sudden movements i never once felt like it might fall off final thoughts sizing tip the ringconn gen combines style comfort and functionality in a surprisingly compact form for anyone looking to track their health without the bulk of a smartwatch this ring is absolutely worth considering my recommendation for sizing i suggest choosing a comfortable size for your index finger that also fits snugly on your middle finger and slightly looser on your ring finger this gives you flexibility and ensures the ring stays comfortable throughout the day no matter which finger you wear it on

more good than bad pros lightweight attractive well built comfortable to wear user friendly interface with easily understood and accessible data gui not gimmicky sleep apnea evaluation option fast response from customer service to questions outstanding battery life with fast recharge cons simply not dependable as a step counting activity tracker for instance mowing on a riding lawn tractor for a few hours results in steps counted per customer service certain devices may misinterpret some arm movements as walking leading to an overestimation also the ring estimates step count based on accelerometer data and other sensor inputs therefore in daily life certain movements such as unconscious actions caused by ankle pain or hand movements while sitting may sometimes be misinterpreted as steps leading to an overestimation of step count so steps counted while seated no sh t sherlock less than useful advice like the rem state still has room for improvement without further recommendations overall while the device provides a wealth of data much of that data and evaluation seems integrated into questionable accelerometer data so the balance of the data feels less reliable than i had expected however i believe this is a common problem with ring type trackers and not unique to ringconn

sleep monitor check i bought ringconn specifically for sleep patterns this ring has exceeded my expectations i ve been wearing it non stop for almost months it s so thin and easy i forget it s on my finger definitely opt to get the sizing kit as it fits differently ns finally my big love is battery life i get at least days but often more than advertised i get days on a single charge that blasts all other smart rings away and all this data keeps syncing without a monthly fee that was a showstopper for me get this smart ring it s awesome

buying and using the ringconn key points pros great service smooth buying experience and love the product sleep tracking is excellent for women cycle tracking aspect is intuitive and un intrusive cons only registers running and cycling as exercises no manual entry for other forms of exercise or times when you can t wear it i backed the ringconn in its kickstarter campaign the whole process was smooth and hassle free i got my sizing kit fairly quickly and wore a few different sizes to see what felt right i found it very difficult to select the right size but eventually settled on one when the time came i selected my colour and size and sat back and waited for my order to be shipped once i got it i discovered that the fit was not as i expected but enough larger than the demo sizer to not fit me properly so i requested a size exchange this went through without a hitch and i absolutely love my ringconn ring it tracks my sleep very well which is the main reason i got it and all my other bios the one and only nit that i would pick would be that you can t enter manual exercise entries and the ring only records running cycling this means that the fitness classes that i do where i can t wear the ring don t get recognised as active activity times also it doesn t register any of the fitness classes i do as exercise and if it s a low no impact class that doesn t register any steps but does raise the heartrate the app registers my exercise as moderate stress this is not enough of an issue to impact my satisfaction with the ring and the process of buying it online the cycle tracking is fairly basic but pretty easy to use and easy enough to modify if needed the interface is intuitive and un intrusive

simple efficient long lasting smart ring in the market why ringconn i ve tried other smart fit tracker device and smart watches are not for me i m personally looking for a smart ring device that is simple efficient and has long lasting battery comparing it with other brands in the market their technology and free app integration were the wins for me not to mention its affordable price range i wanted to use it mainly to keeping track of my heart rates and primarily my sleep i got the ringconn silver from their black friday sale on their website as an early christmas gift for myself it was definitely worth the purchase shipping was fast to the philippines make sure first to get their sizing kit to ensure you ll get the perfect and comfortable fit i ve been using it for the past three months and it s pretty much seamless sometimes i forgot that i m wearing it one downside though is the silicone ring protection it s thin enough for comfort however not that durable as it got essily worn out nonetheless this dmart ring device serves its purpose to let me know how i m sleeping and a motivation to drive a fit lifestyle thank you ringconn team more power and i hope the app stays free

sort of good i bought the ring with the hope of replacing a monitoring band for sleep and stress tracking the experience has been ok ish it tracks your pulse and blood oxigen quite accurately also stress during the day is pretty accurate when it comes to sleep tracking that s where things take a turn for the worse while it is quite good in identifying when you go to sleep it makes the difference between sleeping and just lying on the couch watching a movie the actual sleep parameters i find are quite off you generally wake up to a sleep score of over even on bad nights hrv during the night for me was quite unchanged whether i had a relaxation day or an intense workout day with lots of work besides it it generally overshoots both rem and deep sleep undershooting awake time activity tracking is limited to walking running and biking and only if location is turned on this last part for me was enough reason to not use it as an activity tracker on the plus side support is really fast on answering questions and addressing problems however i do not know how much of the feedback they use for improvement there is lots of potential in this ring but some of the aspects really need atention

best smart ring amazing innovation the ringcon smart ring is a game changer i recently purchased the ringcon smart ring and it has completely exceeded my expectations this innovative device seamlessly blends style functionality and advanced technology into a sleek wearable gadget that has quickly become an essential part of my daily life compact yet powerful despite its small size the ringcon smart ring offers a wide array of features from fitness tracking to health monitoring it delivers accurate and reliable data all at the tip of your finger literally it s hard to believe how much technology is packed into such a lightweight and comfortable accessory health and fitness tracking the fitness tracking capabilities are outstanding it tracks heart rate steps calories burned and even sleep patterns with impressive accuracy i love waking up and checking the detailed breakdown of my sleep cycle which has helped me make significant improvements to my routine seamless connectivity pairing the ring with my smartphone was quick and effortless the app is intuitive with a clean interface that makes it easy to access insights and reports notifications and alerts from my phone are subtle yet effective ensuring i stay connected without the constant distraction of checking my device stylish design the ringcon smart ring is as stylish as it is functional its sleek minimalist design makes it perfect for everyday wear whether i m at the gym at work or out for the evening it doesn t feel bulky or intrusive and i ve received countless compliments on its modern aesthetic battery life that impresses one of the standout features is the impressive battery life a single charge lasts several days which is incredibly convenient i never feel tied down by constant charging which is a huge bonus for any wearable device durability and comfort the ring is made with high quality materials that are not only durable but also comfortable for all day wear i barely notice it on my finger and it holds up well to daily activities including workouts and washing my hands why i recommend it the ringcon smart ring is the perfect combination of practicality style and cutting edge technology whether you re looking to improve your health stay connected or simply own an innovative piece of tech this ring is a fantastic choice final thoughts ringcon has truly outdone itself with this smart ring it has quickly become a staple in my routine and i can t imagine going back to life without it if you re on the fence about purchasing one i wholeheartedly recommend giving it a try you won t regret it five stars for this incredible product

great ring but software could be improved i love my ringconn ring as i also own the gen oura ring i feel that i can provide a meaningful perspective pros ringconn has a slimmer profile longer battery life and best of all no monthly fee in addition i have a rare limitation in that the oura ring doesn t accurately read my heart rate while both gen and gen versions of the ringconn read my heart rate flawlessly cons where ringconn falls short is that some of the software aspects are not quite as good as oura for example oura has much better accuracy at reading when i m awake vs being asleep many times where the ringconn shows me sleeping the oura accurately recognized that i was awake and reading a book another area where ringconn falls short is that there is no integration with partner software so it doesn t recognize workouts i might have done that are recorded on strava and apple health the ringconn app is good with lots of useful information i find that the ai aspect is not very useful and gets in the way of just looking at the data in contrast oura has a slightly more meaningful ui that makes it easier to understand the data presented overall i can recommend the ringconn it s solid reliable and the lack of a monthly membership fee is a welcome benefit

i love everything about my ringconn i love everything about my ringconn i love that there is no charge for the app i love how light the ring is compared to the ora ring i love how it gives me detailed information about my sleep such as my rem sleep deep sleep heart rate and light sleep among other details the first thing i check in the morning is my sleep score this has helped me with getting to bed at an earlier time and has helped me cut way back on alcohol because it drastically affects your sleep score when i drink wine or stay up to late my sleep score is in the s and my deep sleep and rem sleep are less than an hour otherwise it s in the high s and mid s and my deep sleep and rem sleep are over hours each i love that it tracks all my steps without having to have my phone attached to me the only downside is it took weeks for me to receive it i guess it comes from overseas it was definitely worth the wait i love it

awesome ring this ring packs a powerful punch so don t let the size fool you i bought a lot of smart rings to test a lot of them out and this one by far is the best in the market first thing is i like that it s thin because that makes a huge difference since some of them are just so thick it s uncomfortable to work with battery life is exactly what they state it lasts just about two weeks or so other rings if they re constantly running in the background like measuring heart rate or pulse ox for example it drains the battery like crazy but this ring does not to me there s no point of wearing a smart ring if it s not going to constantly measure the details without dying so quick the price of the ring to me is pretty fair considering what you re expecting to work out of a good item the saying you buy cheap you get cheap is exactly the case with all these smart rings and the material they make this out of does not damage easily at all which is another big plus for me if you are rough the measurements are very accurate because i put it to the test since i work in the medical field it makes it a little bit easier to measure things so overall this is an excellent ring to keep track of things if you don t always want to use your apple watch or any smart watch for that matter i have used this for a few months now so i can accurately measure if it lives up to the expectations the only thing i hope that they add in the next software update would just be to measure blood pressure since all the other smart rings do that and for this one measuring everything under the sun they just didn t add blood pressure check so i hope to see that shortly but looking forward to the third generation whenever it comes out

inaccurate data have had the smart ring ringconn for about months my first impression is that the ring is well made and seems to have some sophisticated technology simply put the functions as indicated on the ring main screen are sleep stress activity and heart rate it provides a lot of data on each function personally i find the data almost overwhelming and squeezed together what i have found in my brief time with the ring is that under activity steps is that they are inaccurate i have a pedometer and an apple watch and they both record similar readings in steps taken also the ring does not provide distance for the steps if you know how many steps you should know the approximate distance the ringconn is way off on average steps this is unacceptable and i would think skews the data on other applications on the ring the heart rate bpm is also suspect during activity no clear way to test except by my watch and that indicates a discrepancy i am disappointed that the ring does not capture the most basis function of exercise steps in an accurate manner and heart rate i did contact ringconn about the steps issue and got a response promptly but the answer was sort of undefined and in no way an answer to solving the issue i have reset the ring several times but that did not change the accuracy of the steps i will try it for a little while longer then i will have chalk this up to some devices are not up to the task i would not buy this ring if you expect it to record the basic function of tracking your exercise steps or even distance and perhaps heart rate during activity dm

ringconn works hard for its customers i have been using the ring since its inception and with messenger we have built a strong community of people who help each other and ringconn listens to what our concerns are they are constantly improving the app and now have had beta testers including me to help in adding more and more functionality to the ring it has really improved in the sleep area immensely that is why i bought it initially it gives you a multitude of information about the quality of your sleep and it now adding sleep apnea for those who need it where it needs the most improvement and it is working hard to do that is tracking your exercise accurately whether on a bike or just walking they keep adding more yet the accuracy really still lags in many of those programs i can speak to the walking i am tall and long legged and i can walk a mile in under minutes yet a minute walk that my iphone shows miles their beta app is showing only miles quite a difference the algorythym still needs a lot work maybe they need to build in your height stride or whatever to get it more accurate i will leave it to their programmers they are always willing to listen and improve go out and buy this ring you will not be disappointed

good ring but inaccurate hr readings while training dit i got the ring shortly after writing the review below so far so good it is not very accurate for measuring the heart rate while training it consistently measures a heart rate that is much lower than reality vs bmp i wish it also measured the skin temperature but that seems to only work while sleeping for some reason for the delay they did send me the ring protectors to compensate but honestly i will never wear these protectors they are ugly and are a hassle to put on i would rather put a glove or take the ring off if i feel i could scratch it previous review i wish i could review the ring but yuntrack is so damn slow to deliver that i am still waiting for it weeks after ordering it the sizing kit took days to arrive and the ring looks like it will take days i mean at this price charge more and use a better delivery service that will actually get it to customers in a matter of days not weeks

in general i like the product in general i like the product i went through wellue rings before trying this it holds the charge as claimed which is amazing it charges in minutes or less as claimed also amazing the water resistant aspect is my most favorite part as i think i lost at least two of the previous brand because of that i love that it is not bulky and looks like normal jewelry i find most of the readings accurate when they are taken the things i would change if i could continuous readings for oxygen and heart rate for some of us that are chronically ill it is important to know in lass than minutes if our oxygen drops along those lines notifications when we have readings outside of certain settings these are huge and frankly i wouldn t have bought the ring if i had more clearly understood if it can send sedentary notifications it should be able to send others the sleep recording is way off i am chronically ill on really bad days i am sedentary for the better part of the day the ring records that as sleep and not just sleep but deep sleep and rem sleep this doesn t seem appropriate i think this is a great product and hopefully with some updates and tweaks along the way it will be an amazing product

ringconn review what i like is the convenience put it on and forget about it being able to shower with it on is great stress and sleep measurements work well the wellness balance suggestions are helpful what i don t like is the heart rate and step counter measurements they both only work correctly when your arm is moving i work out on a stationary bike i also wear another heart rate monitor on my arm my other heart rate monitor will be reading for example however the ring thinks i m inactive because i have my arms on the handle bars not moving i also don t get any credit for steps because my arm is not moving so i don t get any credit for the whole workout if you walk or run for exercise the ring is great i also use a push mower to mow grass on a slopping lot it is a great workout but my heart rate according to the ring will stay around because my arms are on the mower handle not moving i also don t get any credit for steps for the same reason arms not moving if i take my arm off the bike or mower the heart rate and steps are correct mowing and biking one handed is difficult and not sustainable i do manage to reach my step goals but i have to do extra walking or running to achieve it i really do like the ring i hope a firmware update will fix these issues

satisfaction despite challenges review satisfaction despite challenges i had the pleasure of working with isla as my guide and i want to share my positive experience isla was always there for me and constantly provided guidance even when there were issues with the delivery let me detail my experience service the overall service was very good email response times were excellent and i always felt well supported and informed delivery delivery was challenging it took significantly longer than i expected personally i believe this should be communicated more clearly as i couldn t find any information about the extended delivery times anywhere returns returning items incurs a fee which is understandable but it would have been helpful to know this in advance ringconn gadget app the app has room for improvement from my perspective more customer data might be needed to further optimize it overall picture despite some challenges i m overall satisfied with the experience isla s assistance played a significant role in this appreciation dear isla you are the best thank you for your tireless efforts and excellent support overall i had a positive experience and can recommend the service especially thanks to isla

updated i ordered my boyfriend a ringconn because it s seems like a pretty cool idea i ordered it on and got it but i need to exchange the ring for a different size and it has been the worst process ever i have emailed them twice so far and called once i wasn t able to reach anyone at their number for minutes then got a voicemail and left a message still no response i ll update this review once they respond if they ever do but it sucks that you pay and get no communication if there are issues it really seems like they don t care about employee experience at all if this continues i ll just ask for a refund back but would not recommend it at all ours has much better customer service update they have assisted me in getting a replacement ring and were quite helpful they suggested shipping a sizing thing but we knew the correct size so they just send us the ring and it even came quicker than the original ring thanks so much for your help ringconn

ringconn has a long way to go to bring their customer service up to par so far the ring performs as advertised i wish i could give it a better rating but the issues i had with customer service overshadowed the experience in ways i won t soon forget my ring was lost in shipping and the support group at ringconn was slow unhelpful and condescending in handling my issue after many messages to support and responses that were days late or failed to address my issue ringconn finally agreed to ship me a new ring i requested overnight shipment to make up for the lost time and frustration i experienced and they disregarded my request completely instead sending a new ring three days later via usps they repeatedly disregarded my request to have a supervisor contact me several days later i received two rings on consecutive days no sooner had the second ring arrived than i began getting urgent messages from ringconn to return it they asked me to take it to a shipping location which i refused to do i used a shipping label they provided and left it out for my postman to pick up i have rarely experienced such incompetent service nor have i been disregarded as completely as i was by ringconn i was far more diligent in sending back the second ring than they were in addressing my concerns i only hope i don t have an issue with the ring since i have no confidence ringconn will stand behind their product follow up i received a lengthy response from ringconn after posting my review like all their communications it was vague and did not address my concerns i have dealt with online sellers of many products for decades and have never been treated so disrespectfully i ve wasted enough time on this i should have purchased an oura

so function and sleep function incorrect the purchase etc went fine but having used it now i find that the so measurement on the ring during sleep has changed to a much lower reading i check with another gadget i have and that i know meets medical standards and that one shows antwo point higher average more or less what i had when i started using the ring ni don t know what changed but this basically makes the ring useless for me as i had bought it specifically to measure that also two nights ago i barely slept and was awake most of the night i got a score on my sleep which is even higher than nights where i know the sleep was mixed i would like to return my ring and get a refund the ring was purchased months ago and i use it typically only at night although i have now had it on for a full week

latest app update a disaster for several months i found the ring to be very helpful in analyzing my sleep the data provided me with a chart of my sleep stages during the night within the past few weeks however the app was updated and i no longer have access to the sleep data chart only a single number telling me my total sleep for the night no more data telling me the amount of light sleep deep sleep and rem sleep i sent in a request to have the problem fixed but the reply was totally unsatisfactory telling me it would be fixed with the next upgrade that might be months if at all i bought the ring based on the data presentation that i was initially provided not on the very abbreviated presentation i now have i have no idea why the company would take such a huge step backward i did not buy the ring based on the skimpy data that is now provided i have no choice but to demand a return of my money

months review i ve had my ringconn ring for exactly months now it has given very reliable results over this time period with no significant problems particularly helping me track sleep and steps the step tracking feature has definitely been a helpful motivator in getting me active most every day although i did need to learn exactly how it was measuring steps which was not the number of times my feet touched the ground but was actually the number of times my arms would swing freely as i walked for instance i did need to learn to carry my grocery bag with my right hand in the store and let my left ring hand swing freely if i wanted my shopping walking to count but it s basically been an extremely effective and also very unobtrusive device for helping me monitor these health wellness functions

neurodivergent helpful detailed sleep and stress the ring is crafted well and never feels too warm or tight loose with the two bumps which was something i was worried about before owning it what sold me on this ring and why i m still very happy with it is that i m a neurodivergent person that struggles with things like severe adhd and a very common comorbidity of that insomnia having a ring that accurately tracks whenever you sleep no matter the time and understands and displays sleep stages has been so useful for me to track and understand so much more about my sleep needs and patterns including learning i have my most efficient and restful sleeps with the best ratio of deep and rem sleep stages when i sleep between hours vs more less hours it also tracks stress levels very well that compares and outdoes what my apple watches did for me in the past but on a ring on my finger instead of a watch that has a poor battery it is also been surprisingly durable and waterproof to where i can just forget it is on i do tend to take it off to charge while i shower but it s not due to not being able to shower with it on i just found that to be the most convenient and efficient way to keep my ring charged without interrupting my schedule i had issues with my ring not keeping charge more than days after months of use and they without hesitation mailed me a replacement to use within the same week this second one has kept its charge same as when i first got it and lasts days but i charge mine more often as mentioned so i rarely have to push it unless i just forget to take it off when i shower speaking of the case it is just great i rarely ever have to plug in the case to charge maybe once a month or longer very very happy with it only improvements i want to see more of is just more features on the app but those are already promised and even within the time of purchasing it until now there have already been new features and bug fixes added routinely which is always a good sign of a healthy app development cycle and a team that is organized and follows agile methodology i m a software engineer so it s easier to spot for the price this is such a good investment for me and i m happy to have jumped onto the ringconn bandwagon over the others i had researched in comparison excited to see what comes next

pretty good ring but swelling of finger a major issue my ringconn ring has been an interesting experience i purchased this as part of a black friday sale i needed a ring sizing kit and this was sent to me although i felt it was dispatched and delivered a bit slowly i decided on a ring size after wearing the sizing ring a couple of days i wanted the ring to be worn on my non dominant hand the ring arrived in a reasonable time after i selected the ring size online it charged up properly the set up was okay but i did feel that ringconn s app was asking for too much personal information such as my home address it should be asking only for the rock bottom minimum information from the user my home address is not needed for a health tracking application after a time it became clear to me that the ringconn app installed on my iphone was rather basic but it seemed to be sending my health data to a server somewhere on the internet for example to get a report of my health data such as the stress score sleep trends step counts over time the information appears to be made available from a server i have no idea if this information is encrypted on the remote server s or not and what other parties have access to my personal data such as my daily sleep patterns even so for a almost months it was fun to wear my ring daily hours a day except in the shower or when doing some messy chores with my hands like washing dishes it was fun seeing the trends develop over time but then quite recently a problem developed the finger that i used for my ring seemed to start swelling i could not get the ring off easily perhaps this is tied to increasing physical activity on my part or warmer temperatures as the short winter ended and spring arrived i am not sure my skin came off a bit the last time i wrenched the ring off my finger not a lot of skin and there was really almost no pain but there was some minor bleeding that stopped quickly i decided i had better stop wearing the ring recently my finger has healed enough to put the ring back on but the fit is so tight that i m afraid i ll injure the finger again when i need the ring to come off so i m not sure what to do i wish i could have ordered a quarter size larger for example ring size instead of or a half size larger as in i have given the ring to my wife since she is interested in ringconn i think that eventually health tracking rings need to be constructed from flexible materials that can accept some amount of physical expansion or contraction i think ring materials that are flexible in this way are very necessary for me i don t understand why my finger swelled and perhaps it will contract this coming winter with cooler temperatures but the ring is useless to me if it cannot fit on my finger just right also it is important for customers to feel that their personal information is safe that it will not be sold to third parties for any reason that it is secured such that even ringconn employees cannot decrypt someone s personal information that it cannot be decrypted by third parties and that even if the data is stolen by thieves it cannot be decrypted by them either even if the thieves wait a few years and try to decrypt at that future date overall i like the idea of a health tracking ring but the materials need to be improved and the security of my personal data really needs to be assured

this is the fitness ring to get after exhaustively researching the big names in fitness rings oura circular ultrahuman and ringconn i chose ringconn ringconn was less expensive had a lot of excellent and believable reviews and perhaps most importantly has no monthly subscription extortion fee which other companies should be absolutely ashamed to charge for such an expensive product the ringconn ring isn t quite as nice looking as some of the others but it looks absolutely fine so i have no regrets on that front i ve been wearing the ring for months it took a few days for the ring to get to know me and provide what appeared to be accurate data but it has been rock steady and excellent ever since the results are consistent with and i think more accurate than my galaxy watch s sleep data the only thing which confuses both my ringconn and my galaxy watch is my bed s vibrating massage function using it typically results in inaccurate sleep data the ringconn app provides detailed information but is very user friendly and easy to understand the few times i found errors in the data which turned out to be caused by the bed s massage function i submitted a ticket through the app and received a satisfactory response within a day the charging box is the best charging system of any ring it is super convenient and works flawlessly i typically charge the ring every few days while i take a shower just because that s convenient but based on the battery level readings in the app one charge would last days i m glad i did so much research before choosing ringconn this brand seem to be the underdog of fitness rings at the moment but i would not be surprised if they end up the leader imho ringconn s product design accuracy price customer service and pay once model leave the others in the dust

it seems to make the data up initially all seemed well long wait to receive the ring during the kickstarter campaign but the company tried to keep people updated even though their own spreadsheet didn t match up with delivery volumes and dates after wearing the ring for a few months i ve been receiving worrying heart rate data of very high heart rate these figures didn t match up at all with a smart watch readings or an external blood pressure monitor heart rate around bpm ring sometimes records resting heart rate bpm during these high heart rate recording other devices track a higher heart rate of bpm but no where near the figures ringconn records and these are not brief blips of a minute or two but minute periods i have contacted ringconn on a few occasions sending them data showing the high reading and just receive a standard copy and paste reply basically fobbing me off saying they are aware of high heart rate readings and updating software algorithms to correct the issue which never seems to happen as for the rest of the data the ring provides the sleep figures can be way off as well which is the only other metric i can verify and as i ve got no way of checking the rest of the data i ve got no way of confirming how accurate it is ringconn keep updating the design of the app which is pointless if the data it shows isn t accurate basically don t buy a ringconn ring it ll be money wasted

quick delivery easy to set up and accurate bio ring i researched this ring and others before settling on the ringconn primarily because there is no recurring cost i found the analytics to be similar with more costly rings i ordered the ring sizing kit on nov the kit was delivered on nov i submitted my ring size on nov and received my ring on dec the ring is simple to set up and i compared the ringconn analytics with some of my other heath monitoring systems and the ringconn is accurate and looks good as well

i went from a fitbit to oura and now to i went from a fitbit to oura and now to ring conn very very happy it has the step accuracy of fitbit oura is not even close to being an accurate step counter this ring automatically recognizes exercise and then rates the level of exercise accurately plus you can t just add a workout and cheat this setup it knows when your working out with fitbit or oura you can manually add the workout which then inflates your heart rate and gives you workout credit whether you actually worked out or not oura is slow to recognize stress this ring is spot on all the time this is the only ring that gives you hr automatic heart rate spo and hrv readings all the time that is super accurate and then gives you an ongoing average all day and night of those metrics come on everyone please realize your hrv is the epicenter of all of your workout or just normal recovery from anything your doing this ring nails it even when compared to my chest strap that measures my hrv and i can see it at a glance anytime wherever i am the information pages are like no other app with ongoing averages to all your other metrics and a trend format like no other i am surprised there is no monthly charge for this app i bought the silver and it is a beautiful ring matte finish in the center to a polished surface on the edges very durable too if i listened to all the marketing bs comparing this ring to the others i might not have bought this ring just buy it and enjoy it is truly the best

very dissatisfied customer i ordered a ring from ringconn after researching many different ones i did not pick the i don t know my size as i have a ring sizer at home and i know my ring size however once i received my ring and wore it for days my nd knuckle on my pointer finger was sore and bruised however the ring itself fit i have long skinny fingers so the width of the ring takes up the entire area from the end of my finger where it touches my hand to the nd knuckle i ordered the ring to fit both index fingers along with both pointer fingers i have autoimmune disorders that affect my joints and cause pain so sometimes i am unsure how something with affect my skin joints and be comfortable for me until i get and wear it this happened once i wore the ring i emailed the ringconn less than a week of receiving and wearing the ring explaining the situation and was told my circumstance does not allow for returns and i could either continue to wear it even though i told them it is painful and causing bruises or i could gift it to someone so i am now going to be out the money the ring cost along with having to purchase another tracker of some kind i received absolutely no assistance from the company whatsoever i do understand that i chose the the ring size and like i said it does fit but there are things that i cannot always plan for with having autoimmune disorders which is partly the reason why i chose their product as it would track some health measures i needed and wanted

very satisfied user i have been using my ringconn for about a month now and it has been very helpful in monitoring my health i purchased it specifically for the sleep tracking since i can t stand to wear my bulky apple watch to sleep the sleep tracking data is very thorough and complete and gives a score every night on the quality of your sleep which i find helpful at a glance to see how it went as far as the fitness tracking and heart rate i wear both ring and watch during the day and both get the same or very similar results so i believe that the fitness data the ring collects is pretty accurate i have a friend with the oura ring and have compared data with them and the ringconn records the same data without the need for a paid subscription which is a great feature also i think that the ringconn s detailed sleep data is more inclusive than what the oura is able to provide overall i m very happy with my ring and i find it so easy to wear i forget it s there just an fyi the shipping takes a very long time to arrive but that s ok i was able to communicate with support and was reassured that it was on the way and not lost

finally a serious contender in the health ring arena i just received my order of a gorgeous black ringconn and i have to say how impressed i am with the quality of work that has gone into creating this ring from its packaging to functionality fit and esthetics this health tracking ring beats the front runner in this field hands down for example it can measure blood spo saturation index continuously something that even the oura ring can not do without draining the battery and talk about battery i just love the charging box that comes with it a subtle and functional addition that no other similar smart ring has the ring charges from almost no charge within an hour or so and the charge lasts for a good days the app is also a work of art and packed with live and historical health data and other information you can just tell that a massive amount of work has gone into creating ringconn app alone ringconn also has built in temperature sensors and will soon activate the feature with an app update to measure core body temperature too it currently only measures skin temperature during sleep and again another feature that oura doesn t have as for accuracy i have checked the spo and sleep data against my medical grade oximeter and my zeo ekg device the results are within of each other in contrast my oura ring results are within a margin of error which makes the ringconn an undisputed winner in accuracy as far as i am concerned i would definitely recommend it
